DOC.detailed_description: Primary hypothesis : The primary goal study compare vaccination group . Using GMTs measure immunogenicity 3 different vaccination regimen , test non-inferiority Group I Group II Group I Group III . Our hypothesis : 1 . GMTs antibodies 4 HPV type ( 6 , 11 , 16 18 ) follow 3-dose series vaccine woman give low dos vaccine ID route NFI ( Group III ) non-inferior GMTs woman give standard dos IM route needle syringe ( Group I ) . Non-inferiority criterion satisfy upper 95 % confidence limit ratio GMTs ( GI/GIII ) less 1.5 HPV type . 2 . GMTs antibodies 4 HPV type ( 6 , 11 , 16 18 ) follow 3-dose series vaccine woman give standard dos vaccine IM route NFI ( Group II ) non-inferior GMTs woman give standard dos IM route needle syringe ( Group I ) . Non-inferiority criterion satisfy upper 95 % confidence limit ratio GMTs ( GI/GII ) less 1.5 HPV type . 3 . The proportion baseline-na√Øve vaccinee seroconverting 4 HPV type ( 6 , 11 , 16 18 ) follow 3-dose series vaccine woman give low dos vaccine ID route ( Group III ) standard dose vaccine IM route ( Group II ) NFI non-inferior seroconversion rate woman give standard dos IM route needle syringe ( Group I ) . Non-inferiority criterion satisfy upper 95 % confidence limit difference proportion less 10 % HPV type .
